script.command: python train.py --epochs 1500 --batch_size 128 --layer SAGEConv --units 512 --activation relu --config "512 relu 0.1 512 relu 0.1 512 relu 0.1" --janossy_config "512 relu 0.1 512 relu 0.1 512 relu 0.1 512 relu 0.1" --learning_rate 1e-4 --input_prefix "../../merge-data/openff-2.0.0_filtered" --datasets "gen2 gen2-torsion pepconf-dlc protein-torsion spice-pubchem spice-dipeptide spice-des-monomers rna-nucleoside rna-diverse" --output_prefix "checkpoints" --n_max_confs 50 --force_weight 1.0
